title: Effect of temperature, hydrogen donor, and zeolites on light cycle oil cracking: thermodynamic, experimental, and DFT analyses
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3740-3752
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00504J, Paper
Akshata Vijay Ramteke, Marvi Kaushik, Divesh Bhatia, K. K. Pant
Experimental, thermodynamic, and DFT analyses determine optimal conditions for maximizing BTX yields from LCO and provide mechanistic insights.
